review: I have visited the doctor for various injuries since 2013. Listens to the patient, soft spoken and provides prudent advice.
The doctor is excellent; he doesn't talk much, but his work is smart, perhaps due to his vast experience.

The doctor was very clear with the issue. He kept unnecessary expenditure to a minimum by only recommending tests that were necessary and after explaining why it was needed. His explanation of the issue was very clear and the resolution was optimal
